name: Gravity Shards (POST JAM)
description:
GRAVITY SHARDS

You have to restore order to the shattered world you found yourself in. You have to collect the gravity shards to make your mistakes undone.

That was the intended story for the game. We were tight on time, so nothing of that in is in there.😉

Game Made under 12h in Godot, (Didn't made it on time)
Assets from Kenney Assets 💖

Share your thoughts with me.
I would appreciate that 😘

Controls
Left Click - Shoot Grappling Hook, Attach onto Objects and pulls you towards them
Right Click - Cut Grappling Hook

People Involved
